turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you get me a drink from Peets?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 4th Street, downtown.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what specific drink do you want me to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A cappuccino with extra foam.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Do you want anything else extra or just anything else in general?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, can you get me a couple of sugar packets and extra cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. Anything to eat?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks. I'd just like to get the drink and that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I've just put in the order. It'll be ready for pickup soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, I appreciate it. Did it come with a receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. It'll be sent to you through text on your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great. I appreciate it, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be all. Thanks for your help. I'll contact you if I need anything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Take care.
